item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 1, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple is open sourcing Swift Build (305 points | 113 comments)

7. USDA Inspector General Who Refused to Leave Escorted from Office by Security (51 points | 6 comments)
8. MindsDB (YC W20) Is Hiring an Office Manager in SF ( | hide)
9. Enhancing your MIDI devices with Perl (10 points | discuss)
10. Discovery of collagen in fossil bone could unlock new insights into dinosaurs (33 points | 4 comments)
11. String of recent killings linked to Bay Area rationalist 'death cult' (174 points | 171 comments)

13. Archivists work to save disappearing data.gov datasets (242 points | 89 comments)
14. Visualizing all books of the world in ISBN-Space (300 points | 61 comments)

22. Newsstands, 2012-2019 (31 points | discuss)
23. CDC data are disappearing (355 points | 268 comments)

27. 3D scene reconstruction in adverse weather conditions via Gaussian splatting (36 points | 9 comments)
28. In Zig, what's a writer? (116 points | 52 comments)
29. Blogging on Paper (2017) (23 points | 10 comments)
30. OpenAI O3-Mini (889 points | 846 comments)
